scenario.name: Call
scenario.send:
NOTIFY sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch][pid] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 NOTIFY Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Event: ua-profile Subscription-State: active Content-Type: application/simservs+xml Content-Length: [len]
<?xml version="1.0"?> <simservs> <dial-tone-management> <dial-tone-pattern>standard-dial-tone</dial-tone-pattern> </dial-tone-management> <three-party-conference active="true"/> <call-hold active="true"/> <explicit-call-transfer active="true"/> <call-waiting active="false"/> </simservs>
